mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SURVEY (SURVEY_SUBJECT, START_DATE, END_DATE) VALUES (#{ surveySubject }, DATE_FORMAT(#{ startDate }, '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(#{ endDate }, '%Y-%m-%d'))
INSERT INTO TBL_SURVEY_QUESTION (SURVEY_CODE, QUESTION_BODY) VALUES (#{ surveyCode }, #{ questionBody })
INSERT INTO TBL_QUESTION_CHOICE (QUESTION_NO, CHOICE_BODY) VALUES (#{ questionNo }, #{ choiceBody })
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_SURVEY
WHERE SURVEY_SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ searchValue },'%')

SELECT A.SURVEY_CODE, A.SURVEY_SUBJECT, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, IFNULL((SELECT D.REPLY_STATUS FROM TBL_SURVEY_REPLY_STATE D WHERE D.SURVEY_CODE = A.SURVEY_CODE AND D.MEMBER_CODE = #{ searchValue }), 'N') AS REPLY_STATUS, B.QUESTION_NO, B.QUESTION_BODY, C.CHOICE_NO, C.CHOICE_BODY FROM TBL_SURVEY A INNER JOIN TBL_SURVEY_QUESTION B ON A.SURVEY_CODE = B.SURVEY_CODE INNER JOIN TBL_QUESTION_CHOICE C ON B.QUESTION_NO = C.QUESTION_NO ORDER BY A.SURVEY_CODE DESC, C.CHOICE_NO ASC

SELECT A.SURVEY_CODE, A.SURVEY_SUBJECT, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, ((SELECT COUNT(D.REPLY_STATUS) FROM TBL_SURVEY_REPLY_STATE D WHERE D.SURVEY_CODE = A.SURVEY_CODE AND D.REPLY_STATUS = 'Y') / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER) * 100) AS REPLY_STATUS, B.QUESTION_NO, B.QUESTION_BODY, C.CHOICE_NO, C.CHOICE_BODY FROM TBL_SURVEY A INNER JOIN TBL_SURVEY_QUESTION B ON A.SURVEY_CODE = B.SURVEY_CODE INNER JOIN TBL_QUESTION_CHOICE C ON B.QUESTION_NO = C.QUESTION_NO
WHERE A.SURVEY_SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ searchValue },'%')
ORDER BY A.SURVEY_CODE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CHOICE_ANSWER (QUESTION_NO, CHOICE_NO, ANSWER_BODY, MEMBER_CODE) VALUES (#{ questionNo }, #{ choiceNo }, #{ answerBody }, #{ memberCode })
INSERT INTO TBL_SURVEY_REPLY_STATE (SURVEY_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, REPLY_STATUS) VALUES (#{ surveyCode }, #{ memberCode }, #{ replyStatus })
mapper.select: SELECT A.SURVEY_CODE, A.SURVEY_SUBJECT, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, B.QUESTION_NO, B.QUESTION_BODY, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_QUESTION_CHOICE D WHERE D.QUESTION_NO = B.QUESTION_NO) > 1 THEN 'choice' ELSE 'write' END AS QUESTION_TYPE, C.CHOICE_NO, C.CHOICE_BODY FROM TBL_SURVEY A INNER JOIN TBL_SURVEY_QUESTION B ON A.SURVEY_CODE = B.SURVEY_CODE INNER JOIN TBL_QUESTION_CHOICE C ON B.QUESTION_NO = C.QUESTION_NO WHERE A.SURVEY_CODE = #{ surveyCode }
mapper.update:
UPDATE TBL_SURVEY
SURVEY_SUBJECT = #{ surveySubject },
START_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(#{ startDate }, '%Y-%m-%d'),
END_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(#{ endDate }, '%Y-%m-%d')
WHERE SURVEY_CODE = #{ surveyCode }
mapper.select: SELECT A.CHOICE_ANSWER_NO AS ANSWER_NO, A.QUESTION_NO, A.CHOICE_NO, A.ANSWER_BODY, A.MEMBER_CODE, B.SURVEY_CODE FROM TBL_CHOICE_ANSWER A JOIN TBL_SURVEY_QUESTION B ON A.QUESTION_NO = B.QUESTION_NO WHERE A.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } AND B.SURVEY_CODE = #{ surveyCode } ORDER BY A.CHOICE_NO
